  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Logging, org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.trees.UnaryNode<org.apache.spark.sql.execution.SparkPlan>, scala.Equals, scala.Product

    public class ScriptTransformation
extends org.apache.spark.sql.execution.SparkPlan
implements org.apache.spark.sql.execution.UnaryNode, scala.Product, scala.Serializable
    Transforms the input by forking and running the specified script.

    See Also:
